column2: Kagro in the Morning podcast (AUDIO): Thursday April 29 2021
column5: Radio Public|LibSyn|YouTube|Patreon|Square Cash (Share code: Send $5 get $5!) Last night was The Big Speech not that you could have told from my TV. But you probably didn’t need a TV to know how Republicans would react. Or the traditional media for that matter. The FBI searched Rudy’s home and office yesterday because he’s a villainous traitor. And that’s all I have to say about that. January 6th insurrectionists who aren’t already in jail are... running for elective office. The Q vortex is sucking in New Agers and yoga moms.
